string.text: Welcome! I have some specialities on offer. Would you like to look?
Well, I admire your entrepreneurial attitude - a snack bar in the Zone. Right next to mountains of radioactive dust...
This is my home and, for some, the Garbage is a hard place to reach. They're hungry when they get here, and there's been no food for miles
But there's a Bar not far from here. The Barkeep buys up all your loot and sells better weapons. Here, you have Bandits and all sorts of scum that'll just kill you for it...

The Bar has its own problems. It's a crowded area. People are too serious and take offence easily, so be careful not to make a fuss there. Also, the Bar is a dead end for many Stalkers. They just reach there and stop. \nThe Garbage is somewhat wilder, with a different kind of action. It's a place where rookies find out if they can handle the Zone. Fighting Bandits and gangsters isn't real combat - it's training! \nDid you know that most rookies die within a week? They either walk into an anomaly, or become a mutant's happy meal. They need a few old timers here to teach them a thing or two...
That's a sobering thought. Who are you, and where are you from?

I was brought up in the forest. Then I traveled around Europe working as a cook. Did you know that all the leftover food from restaurants is given to stray dogs and cats, while the homeless walk around hungry? But in the Zone, how many starving dogs and cats do you see? Yes, very few, because there's a plentiful supply of rookies!
Your food is good. Do you do weapons and ammo?
Talk to Vitek Voron just outside. He's your man, and quite an interesting guy...
Can you tell me about him?

Do you know what the most comfortable creature is in the Zone?\nRavens. They have no natural predators here, and if they have one survival skill amongst them it's knowing where and when death is going to strike next. They just fly around safely, just waiting for fresh dead meat. That's how Vitek got his nickname, Raven. He makes his living from the deaths of rookies in the Garbage...
I see. Thanks for telling me about this 'Raven'
Hello. How can I help you?
Hi. Nice place you have here
It's just right for what I call home
I've been looking around for you. For a trader, you're not exactly easy to find...
I prefer it that way. I'm here to do business, not discuss awkward questions about it...
I see your point. So what are you offering?
To start with, I don't know you, and you don't know me, so there'll be no discussing discounts or favours until we establish a healthy working relationship. Okay?
That's fine with me. Let's get down to business. What do you have?
May I ask a question?
Do you have any transmutation recipes?
You sure? This is valuable information...
No, perhaps not
How much will this 'information' cost?
The usual 30,000... What do you say?
No, it's too much for me. I'll manage without it
Good choice...
I hope so
What are you looking for?
Do you have any other Recipes?
No, I've nothing else at the moment
So, 30,000 roubles. Agreed?
That's rather expensive...
I've transferred the data to your PDA...
Excellent
Okay, here's your money. 30,000 roubles
That's a little pricey for me right now...
Dig deeper in your pockets. 30,000 is quite normal, especially for non-exclusivity... Do you want the Recipe or not?
Lost data?
Do you have any other Recipes?
